content: *this soft comfortable throw is perfect for any room lion brand yarn * skill level easy level 2 nature s choice organic® cotton article #480 3 colors 5 balls each 15 balls total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge one square = 3-1/2 x 3-1/2 in 9 x 9 cm make 71 squares of color sequence 1 72 squares of color sequence 2 143 total sew into strips of 13 squares 11 strips then sew strips together as described in written pattern crochet edging to finish available in different colorways 70507ad pure appeal baby blanket 1 2005 *strawberry macadamia walnut* 90153ad new hope throw 2 2009 *strawberry almond walnut* vanna s choice version 80736ad misty baby afghan 4 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-pure-appeal-baby-blanket-1 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-new-hope-throw-1 3 http //www joann com/new-hope-throw/p270420 html 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/misty-baby-afghan
